page.title: 19A TYPICAL DAY OF A MUM,1985
page.content: 7.10am-Got up and made breakfast 7.30am-Put washing out and got dressed 7.45am-Styled daughter's hair 8.00am-Put make up on 8.05am-Made Bed and tidied up 8.40am-Took girls to school(late again) 8.50am-Walked dog round Beeches 9.30am-Went to work in Windsor 9.45am-Arrived at work,typing to do 12.50pm-Had lunch break 2.00pm-Left office and went shopping 2.50pm-Left Windsor 3.00pm-Went shopping in Slough 3.30pm-Left Slough 3.40pm-Arrived back home,fed dog 4.10pm-Made a pot of tea 4.20pm-Got in washing,still damp! 4.30pm-Tea time(salad),washed dishes 6.15pm-Started making curtains My Mum usually stops doing housework about 7.30pm,and then puts her feet up and watches television.
